Name: Crazy Archery
About the game: Football players from teams around the world have been hijacked to cancel the next World Cup! With the help of your bow and your talent you must save these players and save the next world cup! Will you manage to save the sporting competition that brings the most people in the world? Features : ■ 35 different levels! ■ Addictive! ■ Good decor! ■ Relaxing gameplay!
